verses.verse: And Saul <WH7586> spake <WH1696> to Jonathan <WH3129> his son <WH1121>, and to all his servants <WH5650>, that they should kill <WH4191> David <WH1732>.

But Jonathan <WH3083> Saul's <WH7586> son <WH1121> delighted <WH2654> much <WH3966> in David <WH1732>: and Jonathan <WH3083> told <WH5046> David <WH1732>, saying <WH559>, Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> seeketh <WH1245> to kill <WH4191> thee: now therefore, I pray thee, take heed <WH8104> to thyself until the morning <WH1242>, and abide <WH3427> in a secret <WH5643> place, and hide <WH2244> thyself:

And I will go out <WH3318> and stand <WH5975> beside <WH3027> my father <WH1> in the field <WH7704> where thou art, and I will commune <WH1696> with my father <WH1> of thee; and what <WH4100> I see <WH7200>, that I will tell <WH5046> thee.

And Jonathan <WH3083> spake <WH1696> good <WH2896> of David <WH1732> unto Saul <WH7586> his father <WH1>, and said <WH559> unto him, Let not the king <WH4428> sin <WH2398> against his servant <WH5650>, against David <WH1732>; because he hath not sinned <WH2398> against thee, and because his works <WH4639> have been to thee-ward very <WH3966> good <WH2896>:

For he did put <WH7760> his life <WH5315> in his hand <WH3709>, and slew <WH5221> the Philistine <WH6430>, and the LORD <WH3068> wrought <WH6213> a great <WH1419> salvation <WH8668> for all Israel <WH3478>: thou sawest <WH7200> it, and didst rejoice <WH8055>: wherefore then wilt thou sin <WH2398> against innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>, to slay <WH4191> David <WH1732> without a cause <WH2600>?
And Saul <WH7586> hearkened <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of Jonathan <WH3083>: and Saul <WH7586> sware <WH7650>, As the LORD <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, he shall not <WH518> be slain <WH4191>.

And Jonathan <WH3083> called <WH7121> David <WH1732>, and Jonathan <WH3083> shewed <WH5046> him all those things <WH1697>. And Jonathan <WH3083> brought <WH935> David <WH1732> to Saul <WH7586>, and he was in his presence <WH6440>, as in times past <WH865> <WH8032>. in times: Heb. yesterday, third day

And there was war <WH4421> again <WH3254>: and David <WH1732> went out <WH3318>, and fought <WH3898> with the Philistines <WH6430>, and slew <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>; and they fled <WH5127> from <WH6440> him. him: Heb. his face

And the evil <WH7451> spirit <WH7307> from the LORD <WH3068> was upon Saul <WH7586>, as he sat <WH3427> in his house <WH1004> with his javelin <WH2595> in his hand <WH3027>: and David <WH1732> played <WH5059> with his hand <WH3027>.

And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> to smite <WH5221> David <WH1732> even to the wall <WH7023> with the javelin <WH2595>; but he slipped away <WH6362> out of Saul's <WH7586> presence <WH6440>, and he smote <WH5221> the javelin <WH2595> into the wall <WH7023>: and David <WH1732> fled <WH5127>, and escaped <WH4422> that night <WH3915>.

Saul <WH7586> also sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> unto David's <WH1732> house <WH1004>, to watch <WH8104> him, and to slay <WH4191> him in the morning <WH1242>: and Michal <WH4324> David's <WH1732> wife <WH802> told <WH5046> him, saying <WH559>, If thou save <WH4422> not thy life <WH5315> to night <WH3915>, to morrow <WH4279> thou shalt be slain <WH4191>.
So Michal <WH4324> let <WH3381> David <WH1732> down <WH3381> through a window <WH2474>: and he went <WH3212>, and fled <WH1272>, and escaped <WH4422>.

And Michal <WH4324> took <WH3947> an image <WH8655>, and laid <WH7760> it in the bed <WH4296>, and put <WH7760> a pillow <WH3523> of goats' <WH5795> hair for his bolster <WH4763>, and covered <WH3680> it with a cloth <WH899>. image: Heb. teraphim
And when Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to take <WH3947> David <WH1732>, she said <WH559>, He is sick <WH2470>.
And Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> the messengers <WH4397> again to see <WH7200> David <WH1732>, saying <WH559>, Bring him up <WH5927> to me in the bed <WH4296>, that I may slay <WH4191> him.
And when the messengers <WH4397> were come in <WH935>, behold, there was an image <WH8655> in the bed <WH4296>, with a pillow <WH3523> of goats' <WH5795> hair for his bolster <WH4763>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto Michal <WH4324>, Why hast thou deceived me so <WH7411>, and sent away <WH7971> mine enemy <WH341>, that he is escaped <WH4422>? And Michal <WH4324> answered <WH559> Saul <WH7586>, He said <WH559> unto me, Let me go <WH7971>; why should I kill <WH4191> thee?

So David <WH1732> fled <WH1272>, and escaped <WH4422>, and came <WH935> to Samuel <WH8050> to Ramah <WH7414>, and told <WH5046> him all that Saul <WH7586> had done <WH6213> to him. And he and Samuel <WH8050> went <WH3212> and dwelt <WH3427> in Naioth <WH5121>.
And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586>, saying <WH559>, Behold, David <WH1732> is at Naioth <WH5121> in Ramah <WH7414>.

And Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to take <WH3947> David <WH1732>: and when they saw <WH7200> the company <WH3862> of the prophets <WH5030> prophesying <WH5012>, and Samuel <WH8050> standing <WH5975> as appointed <WH5324> over them, the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> was upon the messengers <WH4397> of Saul <WH7586>, and they also prophesied <WH5012>.

And when it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586>, he sent <WH7971> other <WH312> messengers <WH4397>, and they prophesied <WH5012> likewise. And Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> again <WH3254> the third <WH7992> time, and they prophesied <WH5012> also.

Then went <WH3212> he also to Ramah <WH7414>, and came <WH935> to a great <WH1419> well <WH953> that is in Sechu <WH7906>: and he asked <WH7592> and said <WH559>, Where <WH375> are Samuel <WH8050> and David <WH1732>? And one said <WH559>, Behold, they be at Naioth <WH5121> in Ramah <WH7414>.

And he went <WH3212> thither to Naioth <WH5121> in Ramah <WH7414>: and the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> was upon him also, and he went <WH3212> on <WH1980>, and prophesied <WH5012>, until he came <WH935> to Naioth <WH5121> in Ramah <WH7414>.

And he stripped off <WH6584> his clothes <WH899> also <WH1571>, and prophesied <WH5012> before <WH6440> Samuel <WH8050> in like manner, and lay down <WH5307> naked <WH6174> all that day <WH3117> and all that night <WH3915>. Wherefore they say <WH559>, Is Saul <WH7586> also among the prophets <WH5030>? lay: Heb. fell
